About Me

Est. 2023

Discover more about our mission, who we are, and what we stand for in the expandable paragraphs to the right. We're here to make technology work for you.

Core Values

Excellence: Excellence isn't a goal; it's my standard. I am committed to delivering top-tier service and solutions, ensuring your technology functions at its best. My aim is to not just meet but exceed your expectations.
Integrity: Trust is paramount in our interactions. I uphold the highest standards of integrity, conducting business transparently and honestly. You can rely on ethical conduct and a straightforward approach.
Innovation: In the ever-evolving tech landscape, I embrace change and innovation. I stay at the forefront of industry trends, allowing me to provide cutting-edge solutions tailored to your needs.
Customer-Centric: Your needs are at the forefront of my service. Every solution I offer and every interaction I have is dedicated to delivering value and surpassing your expectations.

Our History: Where we begin

Stover's Computer Repair is more than just a business; it's an adventure. Every step on this path, every client we serve, is a brick in the road that leads to the future.


Our journey began with a singular mission: to provide exceptional computer repair and IT solutions, one client at a time. Each of you, our valued clients, has been an essential part of this remarkable adventure.

As a sole proprietor, I embarked on this path with a passion for technology and a commitment to excellence. From the very start, I knew that every customer would play a pivotal role in shaping our story.

Your trust, your challenges, and your satisfaction have been the building blocks of our journey. With each service call, each problem solved, and every smile of relief from our clients, our path has grown stronger and more purposeful.

So, when you choose us, you're not just a customer; you're a partner in our adventure. You're a vital brick in the road that we're building together. Your support and trust are the foundation of our history, and we look forward to many more chapters in this remarkable journey.

Thank you for being part of our story. We're excited about the adventures that lie ahead, and we're honored to have you as our fellow traveler.

Our Services:

Software Installation

Effortless Software Installation:

We take the hassle out of software installation. Whether it's a new operating system, application, or program, our experts handle the setup process, ensuring everything runs smoothly.

Enjoy quick and trouble-free installation, so you can focus on what you do best.

Peak Performance for Your Systems:

We don't just install software; we optimize it for peak performance. Our team fine-tunes your operating system and software to ensure they work seamlessly together.

Experience faster, more efficient computing with our optimization services.

Tailored Solutions for Your Needs:

Your software needs are unique. We provide tailored recommendations for the right software and configurations to meet your specific requirements.

Get software solutions that align perfectly with your business or personal computing needs.

Hardware Troubleshooting:

In-Depth Problem Analysis:

Our experts delve into various hardware problems and their telltale symptoms. We identify issues like system slowdowns, unusual noises, or device malfunctions to pinpoint the root causes.

Understanding the problem is the first step toward effective troubleshooting.

Thorough Diagnostic Process:

We employ a comprehensive diagnostic process that includes hardware testing and thorough component inspection. We leave no stone unturned to identify the exact source of the problem.

Our goal is to provide you with an accurate diagnosis and transparent solutions.

Quality Repairs and Replacements:

When it comes to hardware issues, we focus on quality and transparency. Our repair and replacement services are performed with precision and care, ensuring your devices function optimally.

You can trust us for reliable hardware solutions that stand the test of time.

Virus & Malware Removal:

Identifying Infections:

Learn to recognize common signs of a virus or malware infection, such as slow performance, pop-up ads, or unusual system behavior.

Early detection is crucial for effective virus and malware removal.

Effective Removal Methods:

Discover the methods and tools our experts use to remove viruses and malware. From antivirus software to manual removal, we've got you covered.

Rest assured that your system will be thoroughly cleaned of any threats.

Preventing Future Infections:

Take proactive steps to prevent future infections. Our tips and recommendations will help you maintain a secure computer.

Stay protected and keep your data safe from malicious threats.

Network Assistance:

Network Design and Setup:

Get detailed information on network design and setup for homes or businesses. Our experts help you plan and implement a reliable network infrastructure that meets your specific needs.

We ensure your network is designed for optimal performance and connectivity.

Troubleshooting Network Issues:

We're here to troubleshoot common network issues and provide effective solutions. Whether it's slow connections, connectivity problems, or other network issues, we've got you covered.

Rest assured, we'll resolve your network problems swiftly and efficiently.

Network Security and Best Practices:

Our guidance on network security helps you safeguard your network against potential threats. We offer best practices for maintaining a secure and reliable network environment.

Protect your data and maintain a network you can depend on with our expert advice.

Custom Builds & Upgrades:

Benefits of Custom PC's:

Discover the advantages of custom-built computers and upgrades. Tailor your system to your unique needs and enjoy better performance, increased reliability, and optimized functionality.

Customization Options:

Explore the range of customization options available, including hardware choices, performance upgrades, and specialized components. Create a computer that perfectly fits your requirements.

Meeting User Requirements:

See real-life examples of how custom-built solutions meet specific user needs. Our expertise in customization ensures your computer performs exactly as you desire.

Remote Support:

How Remote Support Works:

Get an in-depth explanation of how remote support operates and its many advantages. Learn how we can assist you efficiently and securely, no matter where you are.

Remote Troubleshooting Tools:

Discover the software and tools we use for remote troubleshooting and assistance. Our advanced solutions ensure a smooth and effective support experience.

Initiating and Receiving Support:

Follow the steps for initiating and receiving remote support from our team. We make it easy for you to get the help you need, right when you need it.
